Title: RainG2Engine
Description: RainG2Engine is a personal GameEngine base on Xna, It's a kind of  easier version Xna for game develpoer. It's developed in c# and have some function developed by HLSL.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
RainG2Engine is a personal GameEngine base on Xna, It's a kind of easier version Xna for game develpoer. It's developed in c# and have some function developed by HLSL.
